channel.title: Posts on Art of Dmitry Brushray
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Art of Dmitry Brushray

item.title: June Dmitry Brushray 24 Art mix
item.description: Mix of my artworks June 2024. Lord Krios the Siegebreaker Had a chance recently to paint some more chaos terminators. This time is a terminator chaos lord of a custom warband. He’s a former Iron Warrior that joined a Word Bearers warband called the Doomed. The image was painted from miniature reference: https://www.instagram.com/p/CwSXAkUtRiV/ And more description taken from there: Poliorkitikos Krios, a former Iron Warrior who joined the ranks of The Doomed warband, has rapidly risen through the command structure when the warband found its combat doctrine lacking in battles of attrition.

item.title: the Emperor of mankind, fan art by Dmitry Brushray
item.description: Hey everyone! Today I want to show you something really special. Ever since I started painting Warhammer fan art for many reasons I hadn’t been dared to think of approaching this potent figure, the Emperor of mankind. Besides required strong artistic skills one important reason was that I couldn’t see any good idea or a context to show him. Then it has come pretty sudden, I guess it could be called an inspiration.
